H3206.def: = posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

H7896.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H2436.def: = front of the body of a human being, which, when a person is sitting down, forms a kind of platform that can be used for activities like throwing the lot, and that can even function as a sitting place for someone else, like a pet animal, a child or a beloved one; ≈ symbolizes affection and intimacy, and sometimes represents the entire person

H539.def: = state in which an inanimate object is firmly positioned in its place, so that it will not move

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5281.def: = woman, who at some time called herself {L:Mara<SDBH:מָרָא>}; ► wife of {L:Elimelech<SDBH:אֱלִימֶלֶךְ>}, mother of {L:Mahlon<SDBH:מַחְלֹון>} and {L:Chilion<SDBH:כִּלְיֹון>}, and mother-in-law of {L:Ruth<SDBH:רוּת>} and {L:Orpah<SDBH:עָרְפָּה>}

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H5744.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Boaz<SDBH:בֹּעַז>} and {L:Ruth<SDBH:רוּת>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Jesse<SDBH:יִשַׁי>}; grandfather of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8435.def: = the relative order in which children of the same father were born

H6557.def: = large hole in a wall, hedge, or in the ground; ► made with the purpose of entering through those holes or of making the area within it vulnerable; ≈ to have a town with a breached wall is also regarded as a deep humiliation

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation
exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5992.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ram<SDBH:רָם>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Nahshon<SDBH:נַחְשֹׁון>}
= man; ◄ son of {L:Ram<SDBH:רָם>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Nahshon<SDBH:נַחְשֹׁון>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5177.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amminadab<SDBH:עַמִּינָדָב>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Salma<SDBH:שַׂלְמָא>} (also known as {L:Salmah<SDBH:שַׂלְמָה>} and {L:Salmon<SDBH:שַׂלְמֹון>}) and ancestor of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribal chief during time of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}

H8009.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H8012.def: = man, also known as {L:Salma<SDBH:שַׂלְמָא>} and {L:Salmah<SDBH:שַׂלְמָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Nahshon<SDBH:נַחְשֹׁון>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Boaz<SDBH:בֹּעַז>} and ancestor of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1162.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Salma<SDBH:שַׂלְמָא>}, {L:Salmon<SDBH:שַׂלְמֹון>}; ► husband of {L:Ruth<SDBH:רוּת>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5744.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Boaz<SDBH:בֹּעַז>} and {L:Ruth<SDBH:רוּת>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Jesse<SDBH:יִשַׁי>}; grandfather of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}
= man; ◄ son of {L:Boaz<SDBH:בֹּעַז>} and {L:Ruth<SDBH:רוּת>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Jesse<SDBH:יִשַׁי>}; grandfather of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3448.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Obed<SDBH:עֹובֵד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}
